text: is a former Japanese professional athlete. He is best known as an association football player and manager.FootballDatabase.eu, Koji Gyotoku; retrieved 2012-9-23. From 2008 to 2009, he was manager of Bhutan's national football team. ==Club statistics== Gyotoku played for each of the schools he attended before he reached professional level.
